New Life

Services
Car Painting
Transform your car into a work of art! Full or partial repainting, color matching to any request. Trust your car to our experts and give it a new lease on life.
Learn More
Bodywork Repair
We'll restore your car to perfect condition! Professional bodywork repair for any level of damage. We use only proven technologies and materials. We guarantee the preservation of the factory strength.
Learn More
Complete Interior Replacement
Your car is an extension of your home. Make it even more comfortable with a complete interior upgrade. A wide range of materials and colors allows you to create a unique interior just for you.
Learn More
Order of Work
Order of work
  • Consultation: Detailed consultation with the customer regarding the necessary work, cost, and terms of completion.
  • Vehicle preparation: Preparation of the vehicle for work (washing, interior protection).
  • Work performance: Carrying out repair work using modern equipment and high-quality materials.
  • Quality control: Thorough quality control of the work performed at each stage.
  • Vehicle handover to the customer: Handover of the vehicle to the customer after completion of all work, detailed consultation on further operation.
Contact Us
Our Reviews

I was looking for a car service to replace my car's interior and found "New Life". I am 100% satisfied with the result. I recommend this service to anyone who wants to upgrade their car's interior.

Amanda Rhodes

I was pleasantly surprised by the value for money. The car looks brand new, and the repair cost was very affordable.
Don't waste your time, drink coffee
Make your visit to our service center even more pleasant! While waiting for your car to be repaired, you can enjoy:
  • Quick and satisfying snacks: Delicious shawarma, burgers, and french fries.
  • Fresh pastries: Sweet and savory buns, croissants.
  • Fragrant beverages: Coffee, tea, juices, mineral water.
  • Cozy relaxation area: Free Wi-Fi, TV, comfortable sofas.
